info.title: Robinson's Toolkit API
info.description: Unified REST API for Robinson's Toolkit - 1057 tools across 20 integrations

post.description: Execute any of the 268 available tools (234 GitHub + 34 Vercel). Provide the tool name and arguments.

400.description: Bad request - invalid tool or arguments

get.description: Get a list of all 1057 available tools with their descriptions
